Brand_details: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.
Founded by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne in 1976.
Brand_offer: Buy any Apple product and get a free one-year subscription to Apple TV+.
Purchase an iPhone and receive a $50 App Store gift card.
Trade in your old Mac for a discount on a new one.

Brand_details: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. is a South Korean multinational electronics company headquartered in Suwon.
A leading manufacturer of a wide range of consumer and industrial electronic equipment.
Brand_offer: Purchase a Samsung Galaxy phone and receive a $50 gift card for your next purchase.
Buy a Samsung QLED TV and get a free soundbar.
Trade in your old Samsung tablet for a discount on the latest model.

Brand_details: Sony Corporation is a Japanese multinational conglomerate headquartered in Tokyo.
Founded by Masaru Ibuka and Akio Morita in 1946.
A leading manufacturer of audio, video, communications, and information technology products.
Brand_offer: Buy a Sony PlayStation 5 and get a free game of your choice.
Purchase a Sony BRAVIA TV and receive a free sound system.
Trade in your old Sony camera for a discount on a new one.

Brand_details: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products.
Founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University in 1998.
Known for its online advertising technologies, search engine, cloud computing, and software.
Brand_offer: Get 20% off on Google Nest smart home devices for a limited time.
Purchase a Pixel smartphone and receive a free Google One subscription.
Trade in your old Google Home speaker for a discount on the latest model.

Brand_details: Intel Corporation is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Santa Clara, California.
Founded by Robert Noyce and Gordon Moore in 1968.
One of the world's largest semiconductor chip manufacturers.
Brand_offer: Upgrade your PC with an Intel Core i9 processor and receive a free gaming bundle.
Buy an Intel-powered laptop and get a discount on Microsoft Office.
Trade in your old Intel CPU for a discount on the latest model.

Brand_details: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Redmond, Washington.
Founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen in 1975.
Develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, and personal computers.
Brand_offer: Purchase a Microsoft Surface Laptop and get a 15% discount on Microsoft Office 365.
Buy an Xbox Series X and receive a free game pass subscription.
Trade in your old Microsoft Surface device for a discount on a new one.
